programme.title: Scary Movie 3 - Outro Susto de Filme
programme.desc: Acabada de sair da faculdade, Cindy trabalha agora na televisão. Por seu lado, a sua melhor amiga morre misteriosamente ao ver uma cassete e estranhos círculos começam a aparecer na quinta de Tom. Entretanto, Cindy descobre que os alienígenas planeiam uma invasão à Terra.

programme.title: Eu. Escrava
programme.desc: Um filme que retrata o mundo do tráfico de escravos em Londres, através da história de uma jovem em luta pela sua liberdade. Historia verídica baseada na vida de Mende Nazer, atualmente uma escritora e ativista pelos Direitos Humanos.

programme.title: Valquíria
programme.desc: Ao ver Hitler precipitar a Alemanha e a Europa para o caos, o coronel Stauffenberg começa a acreditar que é preciso travá-lo. Em 1943, quando recupera de ferimentos sofridos em combate, reúne forças junto da Resistência Alemã e organiza uma conspiração para matar Hitler: a "Operação Valquíria".

programme.title: Platoon - Os Bravos do Pelotão
programme.desc: Chris Taylor, um jovem e ingénuo americano, decide alistar-se como voluntário para combater na Guerra do Vietname. Chris pertence a um pelotão comandado pelo sargento Elias Grodin, um homem conhecedor e humanitário, e pelo sanguinário sargento Robert Barnes.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Jules e Vincent, dois assassinos, tentam recuperar uma mala roubada de Marsellus Wallace. Este pede ainda a Vincent para tomar conta da mulher, Mia. Butch, um pugilista, é pago por Wallace para perder um combate. Já Honey Bunny e Pumpkin, um casal de pequenos ladrões, quer uma mudança de sítio.

programme.title: Lobijovem
programme.desc: Scott Howard, um estudante de liceu, acredita estar condenado à indiferença e à banalidade na cruel hierarquia escolar. No entanto, acaba por se tornar num fenómeno local quando se transforma num lobisomem.

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: All Quiet on the Montecito Front

programme.title: Deus Existe e Vive em Bruxelas
programme.desc: Deus existe! Vive em Bruxelas, é um estupor e maltrata a mulher e a filha. Sabemos muito do seu filho, mas pouco da filha. Chama-se Ea e tem 10 anos. Um dia, revolta-se contra o pai, entra no computador dele e revela a toda a gente o tempo que lhe resta.

programme.title: Rob Roy
programme.desc: Este filme retrata a história do herói escocês do século XVIII, Robert Roy MacGregor. Entre cenários de beleza fantástica e a dura vida da comunidade, Rob Roy vê-se forçado a pedir dinheiro emprestado ao sinistro Montrose quando um duro inverno ameaça as majestosas Terras Altas escocesas.

programme.title: Besta
programme.desc: Uma jovem perturbada, a viver numa comunidade isolada, vê-se dividida entre a sua família opressiva e controladora e o encanto de um misterioso estranho, suspeito de uma série de crimes brutais.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. programme.title: G.I. Joe - O Ataque dos Cobra
programme.desc: A equipa de elite G.I. Joe é dotada da mais avançada tecnologia de espionagem e equipamento militar para enfrentar um traficante de armas, bem como a crescente ameaça das misteriosa organização dos Cobra de forma a evitar que o mundo se afunde no caos.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliação
programme.desc: A equipa dos G.I. Joe volta para enfrentar, mais uma vez, os Cobra, bem como perigosas novas ameaças dentro do Governo. Incriminados por um crime terrível, mas que não cometeram, só lhes resta uma opção: retaliação.

programme.title: Assalto a Londres
programme.desc: O funeral do primeiro-ministro britânico torna-se o evento mais protegido de sempre, mas também uma oportunidade para matar líderes poderosos. Apenas três pessoas o podem impedir: o presidente dos EUA, os Serviços Secretos americanos e um agente do MI6.

programme.title: O Herói de Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: Desmond Doss foi o único soldado americano que, durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, lutou na frente de batalha sem estar armado, acreditando que matar era errado. Como médico do Exército, evacuou, sozinho, os feridos que tinham ficado em território inimigo.

programme.title: The Good Doctor
The Good Doctor
programme.desc:
The Good Doctor: Created by David Shore. With Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Antonia Thomas. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"oneabello"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's an amazing show","reviewBody":"RANT Alright, I saw some reviews talking about how this show doesn't portray autism correctly and that this was made by "leftist-whores" pardon my French. First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Good Doctor
The Good Doctor
programme.desc:
The Good Doctor: Created by David Shore. With Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Antonia Thomas. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"oneabello"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's an amazing show","reviewBody":"RANT Alright, I saw some reviews talking about how this show doesn't portray autism correctly and that this was made by "leftist-whores" pardon my French. First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"farshidkarimi"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Is it Just Me or....","reviewBody":"I loved this series.

But, it started a nosedive crash into boredom and sloppiness with the introduction of new actors in place of Thomas Gibson and Matthew Gray Gubler.

The new characters are dull, drab, hamming their roles and do not fit with the group nicely.

The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

Is it just me who feeling the show is going downhill or other fans too?

I hope they will come back to bring the show to its former status."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":174861,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. IMDb data; ttnr: 0452046, Title: Criminal Minds, --- Description: Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"farshidkarimi","dateCreated":"2017-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Is it Just Me or....","reviewBody":"I loved this series.

But, it started a nosedive crash into boredom and sloppiness with the introduction of new actors in place of Thomas Gibson and Matthew Gray Gubler.

The new characters are dull, drab, hamming their roles and do not fit with the group nicely.

Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"farshidkarimi"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Is it Just Me or....","reviewBody":"I loved this series.

But, it started a nosedive crash into boredom and sloppiness with the introduction of new actors in place of Thomas Gibson and Matthew Gray Gubler.

The new characters are dull, drab, hamming their roles and do not fit with the group nicely.

The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

Is it just me who feeling the show is going downhill or other fans too?

programme.title: Inimigos Públicos
programme.desc: A polícia federal inicia uma caça ao homem na tentativa de capturar alguns dos gangsters mais famosos dos Estados Unidos, nos anos 30: John Dillinger, "Baby Face" Nelson e "Pretty Boy" Floyd.

programme.title: À Fria Luz do Dia
programme.desc: Will Shaw é um jovem gestor de Wall Street, cuja família é sequestrada durante uma viagem a Espanha. Will terá poucas horas para a encontrar, revelar uma conspiração governamental e descobrir a ligação que existe entre o sequestro e os segredos do seu pai.

programme.title: No Coração do Mar
programme.desc: No inverno de 1820, um navio baleeiro de Nova Inglaterra foi atacado por uma baleia gigante com um sentido de vingança quase humano. Enfrentando tempestades, fome, pânico e desespero, os homens colocam em causa a suas crenças mais profundas. O desastre marítimo inspirou a mítica obra "Moby Dick".

programme.title: O Feitiço do Tempo
programme.desc: Phil, o apresentador do boletim meteorológico de um canal, é enviado a Punxstawnwey para fazer a reportagem do Dia da Marmota. Na viagem de volta, Phil e a equipa são surpreendidos por uma tempestade que os obriga a voltar à cidade. Na manhã seguinte, ouve na rádio o mesmo programa do dia anterior.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Chappie é o primeiro robô com a capacidade de pensar e sentir por si mesmo. Contudo, essa é uma ideia perigosa e um desafio que colocará Chappie no caminho de poderosas e destrutivas forças, que pretendem que ele seja o último da sua espécie.

programme.title: Amar Pablo e Odiar Escobar
programme.desc: A história da ascensão e queda do senhor da droga colombiano, Pablo Escobar, fundador do cartel de Medellín, contada pela sua glamorosa amante Virgínia Vallejo, já então uma jornalista conhecida com o seu próprio programa de televisão.

programme.title: Olha Quem Fala
programme.desc: Mollie é uma mãe solteira à procura do pai perfeito para o seu filho. Mas Mickey, o bebé, vai fazer tudo para que a sua mãe perceba que o companheiro e pai ideal está mesmo ao seu lado.

programme.title: 21: A Última Cartada
programme.desc: Para pagar o curso de Medicina, Ben, um sobredotado do MIT, tenta fazer dinheiro em jogos de cartas. Ele acaba por se juntar à equipa secreta do seu professor de matemática, que, contando cartas e usando um complexo sistema de sinais, consegue "quebrar" vários casinos.

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: Depois de 20 anos fora de Edimburgo, Mark Renton está de regresso à Escócia, o único lugar a que alguma vez chamou casa. À sua espera estão os velhos amigos: Spud, Sick Boy e Begbie. Muito mudou, mas muito ficou na mesma...

programme.title: Nightcrawler - Repórter na Noite
programme.desc: Lou Bloom é um jovem desesperado por trabalho, que descobre o alucinante mundo do crime de Los Angeles. Ao encontrar um grupo de freelancers que filmam casos de polícia, Lou entra no perigoso submundo do jornalismo criminal, onde uma sirene pode valer muitos dólares.

programme.title: Catwoman
programme.desc: Patience Phillips trabalha na Hedare Beauty, uma gigantesca companhia de cosméticos. No entanto, quando descobre inadvertidamente um segredo, é apanhada no meio de uma sórdida conspiração. Morta pela sua patroa, Patience renasce transformada em "Catwoman" e dotada de poderes sobrenaturais.

programme.title: Super-Homem
programme.desc: O planeta Krypton está perdido. Para salvar a sua raça da extinção Jor-El envia o seu filho bebé num foguete para o planeta Terra. Já adulto, para mascarar as suas capacidades e a sua verdadeira identidade, assume o disfarce de Clark Kent, um jornalista tímido e desastrado, que é o Super-Homem.

programme.title: Super-Homem II: A Aventura Continua
programme.desc: Super-Homem enfrenta três criminosos do planeta Krypton, o seu planeta natal. Tal como ele, Non, Ursa e Zod são dotados de incríveis poderes e, quando se aliam a Lex Luthor, quase dominam a Terra. Entretanto, o Super-Homem tinha decidido abdicar dos seus poderes para poder casar com Lois Lane.

programme.title: Super-Homem III
programme.desc: Um génio consegue descobrir uma fórmula aproximada de Kryptonite. Este novo produto transforma Superman numa espécie de segundo Dr. Jekyll e Mr. Hyde.

programme.title: Super-Homem IV: Em Busca da Paz
programme.desc: Lex Luthor rouba de um museu um cabelo da cabeça do Super-Homem e usa-o para criar o Homem Nuclear, um androide que extrai a sua energia do Sol. O seu objetivo, claro, é usá-lo como arma para matar o Super-Homem, para que Luthor possa ficar livre para concretizar os seus planos maléficos.

programme.title: Resgate
programme.desc: Um milionário proprietário de uma companhia de aviação descobre que o seu filho, de nove anos, foi sequestrado e pedem-lhe um resgate de dois milhões de dólares. Inicialmente prontifica-se a pagar o resgate, mas quando conclui que vão matar o seu filho após o pagamento, decide reverter o jogo.

programme.title: Orgulho e Glória
programme.desc: A credibilidade de várias gerações de uma família de agentes da Polícia de Nova Iorque é posta em causa. Durante uma rusga, quatro polícias são abatidos e o detetive-chefe pede ao filho para liderar a investigação. Mas Ray percebe que o que parecia ser um ataque isolado foi, afinal, uma emboscada.

programme.title: O Caloiro da Droga
programme.desc: Malcom é um "geek" que tenta sobreviver num bairro violento em Los Angeles, ao mesmo tempo que procura entrar numa faculdade. No entanto, a sua vida muda quando recebe um convite para uma festa "underground", que o leva numa aventura à descoberta de si mesmo.

programme.title: Outbreak - Fora de Controlo
programme.desc: O coronel Daniels e a sua equipa de investigadores, especializada em doenças infetocontagiosas, encontram numa aldeia do Zaire uma epidemia devastadora. De regresso aos Estados Unidos, trabalham dia e noite para isolar o vírus e descobrir a sua origem.

programme.title: O Predador
programme.desc: Um grupo de soldados tem de enfrentar um inimigo invisível e muito mais poderoso do que todas as suas armas. Recrutados pela CIA para resgatarem reféns, os soldados encontram um inimigo que nunca sonharam existir, o predador perfeito, uma criatura extraterrestre sem paralelo ou adversário à altura!

programme.title: O Feitiço do Tempo
programme.desc: Phil, o apresentador do boletim meteorológico de um canal, é enviado a Punxstawnwey para fazer a reportagem do Dia da Marmota. Na viagem de volta, Phil e a equipa são surpreendidos por uma tempestade que os obriga a voltar à cidade. Na manhã seguinte, ouve na rádio o mesmo programa do dia anterior.

programme.title: Assassinos Substitutos
programme.desc: A hesitação de um assassino a soldo em cumprir a missão de morte de que foi incumbido coloca-o na mira de implacáveis atiradores encarregues de o eliminar.

programme.title: Amar Pablo e Odiar Escobar
programme.desc: A história da ascensão e queda do senhor da droga colombiano, Pablo Escobar, fundador do cartel de Medellín, contada pela sua glamorosa amante Virgínia Vallejo, já então uma jornalista conhecida com o seu próprio programa de televisão.

programme.title: Super-Homem IV: Em Busca da Paz
programme.desc: Lex Luthor rouba de um museu um cabelo da cabeça do Super-Homem e usa-o para criar o Homem Nuclear, um androide que extrai a sua energia do Sol. O seu objetivo, claro, é usá-lo como arma para matar o Super-Homem, para que Luthor possa ficar livre para concretizar os seus planos maléficos.

programme.title: O Predador
programme.desc: Um grupo de soldados tem de enfrentar um inimigo invisível e muito mais poderoso do que todas as suas armas. Recrutados pela CIA para resgatarem reféns, os soldados encontram um inimigo que nunca sonharam existir, o predador perfeito, uma criatura extraterrestre sem paralelo ou adversário à altura!

programme.title: Predador 2
programme.desc: Vem de uma galáxia distante para caçar e deixa um rasto de cadáveres na sua passagem. Em estado de sítio devido a uma guerra entre gangues, Los Angeles é o campo de caça perfeito para o Predador. O tenente Mike Harrigan decide investigar e coloca-se frente a frente do enigmático alienígena.

programme.title: Predadores
programme.desc: Selecionado pela sua aptidão para matar sem escrúpulos, um grupo é deixado no meio de uma selva, algures perdida no Universo. Os predadores humanos são agora sistematicamente perseguidos e eliminados por uma nova espécie de predadores alienígenas.

programme.title: O Portal do Guerreiro
programme.desc: Um adolescente apaixonado por videojogos é acidentalmente transportado para o universo mágico da China medieval com a missão de restabelecer a paz entre dois impérios, salvar a vida de uma princesa e se tornar um guerreiro e mestre de Kung-Fu.

programme.title: O Fugitivo
programme.desc: O médico Richard Kimble, injustamente acusado da morte da mulher, escapa da prisão para encontrar o verdadeiro assassino. Enquanto o procura, é perseguido por um implacável polícia. Acerca do criminoso, Kimble apenas sabe que não tem um braço...

programme.title: A Paixão de Shakespeare
programme.desc: Atormentado pelas dívidas, por um bloqueio criativo e pelos ensaios: as coisas não podiam estar a correr pior para o jovem William Shakespeare. O dramaturgo encontra inspiração em Viola De Lesseps, prometida a um lorde. A paixão é inevitável e, em vez da prometida comédia, escreve "Romeu e Julieta".

programme.title: Outlander
Outlander

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Ce Qui Ne Tue Pas Rend Plus Fort
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Contagem para a Morte
programme.desc: Quando um estimado dono de supermercado é morto, a dona de restaurantes e chef da televisão Billie Blessing envolve-se na investigação do que parece ser a obra de um assassino em série inteligente e sinistro.

programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Morte por Medida
programme.desc: A melhor amiga da chef Billie Blessing, Marian, é contratada para redecorar o estúdio de televisão. Quando a irmã gémea de Marian é assassinada, Billie tem de investigar os amigos chegados delas para descobrir o assassino.

programme.title: Peggy Sue Casou-se
programme.desc: Peggy Sue é uma mulher de meia-idade, deprimida pela sua recenté separação com o marido. Na festa do 25º aniversário da sua graduação escolar, reúne-se com os antigos companheiros, que lhe contam como vai a vida de cada um.

programme.title: Vida Interrompida
programme.desc: Susanna é internada num hospital psiquiátrico, onde acaba por se tornar amiga de outras pacientes. Entre elas está Lisa, uma sociopata sedutora que tenta organizar uma fuga. O filme é baseado na experiência da escritora Susanna Kaysen, que esteve internada durante 18 meses, nos anos 60.

programme.title: Os Produtores
programme.desc: Um produtor da Broadway, à beira da falência, e um contabilista tímido concebem um projeto desonesto com o intuito de enriquecer rapidamente. O objetivo passa por criarem o pior espetáculo do mundo.

programme.title: Olhos Grandes
programme.desc: No final dos anos 1950, o pintor Walter Keane alcançou um sucesso inacreditável com as suas pinturas de crianças com olhos grandes. A chocante verdade acaba, no entanto, por ser descoberta: as obras de Walter eram criadas pela sua mulher, Margaret.

programme.title: A Teoria de Tudo
programme.desc: A extraordinária história de uma das mentes mais brilhantes dos nossos tempos, o astrofísico Stephen Hawking, e de duas pessoas que, por amor, desafiam todas as probabilidades. O filme é baseado nas memórias de Jane Hawking.

programme.title: These Old Broads
programme.desc: Elas juraram nunca voltar a trabalhar juntas, mas quando se reúnem novamente voltam a ter ataques de fúria, a roubar manchetes e a deixar os produtores em lágrimas!

programme.title: O Décimo Círculo
programme.desc: Daniel Stone, um autor de BD, é casado com a professora universitária Laura. A filha de ambos, Trixie, é uma aluna inteligente e popular do primeiro ano do secundário. Quando Trixie diz ter sido violada pelo ex-namorado, os acontecimentos irão pôr à prova lealdades e ligações de todos os envolvidos.

programme.title: Timeless
programme.sub-title: The War To End All Wars

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Tout Vient À Point À Qui Sait Attendre

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Fais Ce Que Dois, Advienne Que Pourra

programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Morte por Medida
programme.desc: A melhor amiga da chef Billie Blessing, Marian, é contratada para redecorar o estúdio de televisão. Quando a irmã gémea de Marian é assassinada, Billie tem de investigar os amigos chegados delas para descobrir o assassino.

programme.title: Darrow & Darrow
programme.desc: Claire Darrow é uma mãe solteira e advogada que quer sempre fazer o que está certo. Quando um amigo próximo é condenado por assaltar uma joalharia, cabe a Claire fazer justiça.

programme.title: A Paixão de Shakespeare
programme.desc: Atormentado pelas dívidas, por um bloqueio criativo e pelos ensaios: as coisas não podiam estar a correr pior para o jovem William Shakespeare. O dramaturgo encontra inspiração em Viola De Lesseps, prometida a um lorde. A paixão é inevitável e, em vez da prometida comédia, escreve "Romeu e Julieta".

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Il N'y a Pas de Grenouille qui ne Trouve son Crapaud - Partie 1

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Il N'y a Pas de Grenouille qui ne Trouve son Crapaud - Partie 2

programme.title: Peggy Sue Casou-se
programme.desc: Peggy Sue é uma mulher de meia-idade, deprimida pela sua recenté separação com o marido. Na festa do 25º aniversário da sua graduação escolar, reúne-se com os antigos companheiros, que lhe contam como vai a vida de cada um.

programme.title: Dança Feroz
programme.desc: Após a morte da mãe, o cubano Rafael Infante vai para Houston trabalhar na escola de dança de John Burnett. Faz limpezas e pequenos serviços, enquanto observa os dançarinos e se apaixona por Ruby, que sonha vencer o Campeonato Mundial de Las Vegas, mesmo que, para isso, tenha de abrir mão do amor.

programme.title: Encontro Diabólico
programme.desc: Um misterioso estranho inicia John numa viagem pelo crime, que irá transformar o marido e pai desiludido e com pouca força de vontade, num herói disposto a ir até onde for preciso para proteger a sua família.

Big Al fez inúmeros inimigos ao longo da vida, mas nenhum mais perigoso do que a sua grande paixão, Kat. Os dois vivem do crime, do tráfico de armas e de assaltos, mas Kat quer mais e começa a vender armas, entrando num mundo novo e do qual Big Al não faz parte.

programme.title: Bordertown - Cidade Sob Ameaça
programme.desc: Uma jornalista do "Chicago Sentinel", filha de imigrantes mexicanos, investiga uma série de crimes de mulheres perto de fábricas americanas na fronteira de Juarez e El Paso.

programme.title: O Culpado
programme.desc: Asger Holm, operador de central de emergências, atende a chamada de uma mulher raptada. Mas quando o telefonema é subitamente interrompido, Asger inicia uma corrida contra o tempo para salvar esta mulher de uma situação que pode ser mais complexa...

programme.title: Fintar o Destino
programme.desc: Mané foi um futebolista famoso em Cabo Verde mas perdeu a oportunidade de sair da sua terra para ir jogar para o Benfica e nunca conseguiu ultrapassar a sensação de frustração e oportunidade perdida. Agora, aos 50 anos, vai tentar o impossível e parte para Lisboa.

programme.title: Altamente Imperfeitos (V.P.)
programme.desc: Moxy é uma UglyDoll que sonha com o dia em que encontrará a sua criança. Com os amigos Wage, Babo e Ugly Bat, decide partir em busca da perfeição. Mas esta aventura só os levará a perceber que o que nos faz únicos é sermos altamente... imperfeitos!

programme.title: O Professor Chanfrado
programme.desc: O professor de genética Sherman Klump tem excesso de peso e, desesperado para conquistar a bela Carla, bebe um soro experimental para emagrecer. Sherman transforma-se em "Buddy Love", um conversador, energético e esbelto Don Juan!

programme.title: Warcraft: O Primeiro Encontro de Dois Mundos
programme.desc: O pacífico reino de Azeroth fica à beira da guerra quando a sua civilização enfrenta uma temível raça de invasores. Quando um portal se abre para ligar os dois mundos, dois heróis são colocados numa rota de colisão que irá decidir o futuro.

programme.title: Assalto Infernal
programme.desc: Gabe, um experiente montanhista de salvamento, é incumbido de resgatar um grupo que se perdeu nas montanhas. Mas esse grupo de pessoas é o mesmo que assaltou um avião do Estado e que procura guias conhecedores do terreno para os levar até às malas que contêm o dinheiro do assalto.

programme.title: Ronaldo
programme.desc: Filmado ao longo de 14 meses, com um acesso sem precedentes ao círculo íntimo de Cristiano Ronaldo, este é o primeiro filme oficial e autorizado do jogador português, que é uma das figuras mais célebres e mediáticas do futebol mundial.

programme.title: Empire State: O Assalto
programme.desc: Chris, segurança numa empresa de camiões, é persuadido por Eddie a assaltar o lugar. Após avanços e recuos, a dupla rouba a maior quantidade de dinheiro da história dos EUA. A equipa do FBI, liderada por Jay Ransone e Rudy Giuliani, pensa que o roubo é da responsabilidade de famílias do crime.

programme.title: Outcast - O Último Templário
programme.desc: Gallain, um guerreiro misterioso, junta-se aos filhos de um imperador chinês deposto para destronar o seu irmão cruel, que procura vê-los mortos. Jacob, que enfrenta os seus próprios "fantasmas", também se junta a eles, procurando salvar o reino e colocar o príncipe no trono.

programme.title: Inferno Vermelho
programme.desc: O inexpressivo agente russo Ivan Danko persegue um traficante de droga de Moscovo a Chicago, onde faz parceria com o agente Art Ridzik, cuja ética profissional é bastante mais relaxada.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: Jon Martello é um tipo de Nova Jérsia que se importa com o seu corpo, a família, os amigos, a sua igreja e, claro, mulheres. Os amigos até o tratam por Don Jon. Insatisfeito, embarca numa jornada em busca de uma vida sexual mais gratificante.

programme.title: Cross - O Poder dos Deuses
programme.desc: Graças a uma cruz Celta, Callan possui poderes incríveis que utiliza para combater o mal. Agora, acompanhado por uma equipa de especialistas em armas, Callan combate um implacável império em Los Angeles.

programme.title: É Só Querer
programme.desc: Após uma vida de estudo, um professor universitário, um explicador e um desempregado continuam sem dinheiro. A solução para os seus problemas pode estar num comprimido, que um deles criou, e que é uma droga que dá uma grande energia, mas sem ressaca!

programme.title: Vendeta
programme.desc: Richard vai com os amigos fazer uma caçada no deserto, mas decide ir uns dias antes com a amiga Jen. Os amigos chegam mais cedo e a situação descontrola-se. A presa passa a ser humana. Jen vai mostrar o incrível sabor da vingança de uma mulher.

programme.title: A Vingança de Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Um filme baseado na história real do lendário Xerife Earp. Conta como reuniu os melhores homens do Oeste para vingar o cruel assassinato da sua amada Dora.

programme.title: Icarus, Máquina de Guerra
programme.desc: Edward Genn, nome de código Icarus, é um assassino treinado do KGB que trabalhou durante anos como um agente adormecido da América. No entanto, quando o Império Soviético ruiu, viu-se isolado num país estrangeiro e sem ninguém em quem confiar.

programme.title: Croupier
programme.desc: Um aspirante a escritor é contratado como croupier num casino e acaba por ser seduzido por aquele mundo. Tudo corre pelo melhor até ele começar a infringir algumas das regras essenciais da profissão.

programme.title: Clara
programme.desc: Isaac Bruno é um astrónomo que busca a vida no Cosmos e foge de uma tragédia do seu passado. Quando conhece Clara, uma artista de mente aberta que partilha o seu fascínio pelo espaço, os dois decidem colaborar na busca de uma grande descoberta.

programme.title: Assalto Infernal
programme.desc: Gabe, um experiente montanhista de salvamento, é incumbido de resgatar um grupo que se perdeu nas montanhas. Mas esse grupo de pessoas é o mesmo que assaltou um avião do Estado e que procura guias conhecedores do terreno para os levar até às malas que contêm o dinheiro do assalto.

programme.title: Ronaldo
programme.desc: Filmado ao longo de 14 meses, com um acesso sem precedentes ao círculo íntimo de Cristiano Ronaldo, este é o primeiro filme oficial e autorizado do jogador português, que é uma das figuras mais célebres e mediáticas do futebol mundial.

programme.title: Inferno Vermelho
programme.desc: O inexpressivo agente russo Ivan Danko persegue um traficante de droga de Moscovo a Chicago, onde faz parceria com o agente Art Ridzik, cuja ética profissional é bastante mais relaxada.

programme.title: Assalto à Paróquia
programme.desc: Durell e LeeJohn são pequenos criminosos que inventam um esquema mirabolante para assaltar a igreja da vizinhança e, assim, conseguirem pagar uma dívida. Só que nada, mas mesmo nada, vai correr como esperavam...

programme.title: Miúdos e Graúdos
programme.desc: No funeral do antigo treinador de futebol, cinco bons amigos e antigos colegas de equipa voltam a juntar-se para passar o fim de semana do feriado de 4 de julho e reviver memórias antigas. No entanto, rapidamente vão perceber que ser adulto, não significa ter crescido...

programme.title: Kung-Fu-Zão
programme.desc: Sing é um pequeno ladrão que sonha entrar no poderoso e prestigiado Gang dos Machados. Ao mesmo tempo, o gangue tenta apoderar-se de um novo território, uma rua sagrada, que é guardada por mestres de kung-fu à paisana. Instala-se então uma guerra entre os habitantes da rua e o Gangue dos Machados.

programme.title: Tripla Ameaça
programme.desc: Três mercenários caídos em desgraça terão de liquidar um grupo de assassinos profissionais antes que estes alcancem o seu alvo, a filha de um bilionário...

programme.title: Operações Especiais
programme.desc: Um agente veterano e o seu parceiro são destacados para uma prisão. Ali, têm de supervisionar a chegada de duas misteriosas prisioneiras, mas, quando o local é atacado por mercenários, os agentes descobrem a verdadeira identidade daquelas duas mulheres.

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: Jack, o Caçador de Gigantes
programme.desc: Uma guerra antiga entre humanos e uma raça de temíveis gigantes renasce quando Jack abre acidentalmente um portal entre os dois mundos. Na luta pelo reino, pelo seu povo e pelo amor de uma princesa, Jack entra na batalha da sua vida.

programme.title: A Grande Muralha
programme.desc: Quando William é preso na Grande Muralha da China, este guerreiro mercenário descobre o mistério que ela esconde. A sua busca por fortuna transforma-se numa jornada de heroísmo, quando hordas de bestas ameaçam aquela estrutura maciça e tudo o que está para além dela.

programme.title: Batalha do Pacífico: A Revolta
programme.desc: Jake Pentecost, um outrora promissor piloto, abandonou o treino e foi apanhado pelo crime do submundo. Mas quando surge uma nova ameaça Kaiju, ele irá juntar-se a Mako Mori para, juntos, liderarem uma corajosa e nova geração de pilotos Jaeger.

programme.title: Esquadrão Suicida
programme.desc: Uma agência governamental secreta recruta alguns dos mais perigosos, até agora encarcerados, Super Vilões do mundo. Juntos, formam uma equipa improvável e são armados com o mais poderoso arsenal à disposição. Derrotar uma enigmática e invencível entidade: eis a missão do Esquadrão Suicida!

programme.title: Arranha-Céus
programme.desc: O edifício mais alto e seguro do mundo está em chamas e Will, um perito em segurança que ali se deslocou em trabalho, é injustamente culpado pelo incêndio. Em fuga, Will tem de encontrar os culpados e salvar a sua família, presa dentro do edifício.

programme.title: Point Break - Caçadores de Emoções
programme.desc: Um jovem agente do FBI infiltra-se num grupo de bandidos, amantes de desportos radicais, suspeito de cometer os mais bizarros e assustadores assaltos. O agente rapidamente consegue aproximar-se de Bodhi, o líder do grupo, e conquistar a sua confiança.

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. Needless to say I'm CSI:M number 1 fan"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54868,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="
